Perspective
Perspective

The methods and guidelines are broadly applicable, but taught
The methods and guidelines are broadly applicable, but taught

using ground-water modeling examples.
using ground-water modeling examples.

There are about as many opinions about how to construct and use models as there are people working with models. There are a number of ongoing methods to standardize ground- water model construction and use. For example, HarmoniQua (€5 million over 5 years), Germany, Australia, New Zeeland, USEPA, USGS, ASTM, …See review by Hill et al. (2004, conf. proceedings, FEM-MODFLOW)
There are about as many opinions about how to construct and
use models as there are people working with models. There
are a number of ongoing methods to standardize ground-
water model construction and use. For example,
HarmoniQua (€5 million over 5 years), Germany, Australia,
New Zeeland, USEPA, USGS, ASTM, …See review by Hill
et al. (2004, conf. proceedings, FEM-MODFLOW)

No set of methods and ideas is best in all circumstances, but
No set of methods and ideas is best in all circumstances, but

we are hoping that by learning one set of methods and ideas, you will improve how you develop models, and be in a position to improvise using new ideas as you come across new, useful ideas.
we are hoping that by learning one set of methods and ideas,
you will improve how you develop models, and be in a
position to improvise using new ideas as you come across
new, useful ideas.
